text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Next is one-furlong sprints. Racers,<n>you've all practiced for
this. Parents,<n>guardians, friends, and family—make<n>sure to
cheer for these kids like crazy!

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Wow, amazing! Narita Brian jumped<n>ahead! She's Biwa
Hayahide's<n>sister, all right.

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: Brian wins first place!

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
She's pretty fast out there, just like<n>her big sister! Give her
a round of<n>applause, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Adult A
text_block_list.text:
She'll make big waves if she ever<n>gets into the Twinkle
Series.

text_block_list.name: Adult B
text_block_list.text: She might even be faster than her<n>sister.

text_block_list.name: Young Hayahide
text_block_list.text: (Brian...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian proved she has more<n>than what it takes to win
the<n>Japanese Derby.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her final sprint is all anyone can talk<n>about, and there have
been nonstop<n>requests for interviews.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The media's clamoring outside the<n>doors again. Ms. Tazuna
was<n>practically in tears begging Brian to<n>talk to them.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't mind making time if it was<n>one or two people, but
Brian wouldn't<n>get a minute to train if we let all those<n>
reporters in...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Guess I'll have to save the day. No<n>worries, I'll answer all
their questions<n>as Brian's spokesperson!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Go ahead, so long as my run isn't<n>disturbed.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Great, that settles it! Fact or fiction, I'll<n>talk about it all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: How about we stick to fact?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Well, I don't think they'll agree to it,<n>but I guess it's worth a
shot.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm heading out to train. The media's<n>all yours.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Oh, if you're going now, you'd better<n>train outside the
school grounds. The<n>academy's teeming with reporters.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Alright.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She really only ever has racing on her<n>mind. However many
races she<n>conquers, it never seems to be<n>enough.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Her focus is what drives her ability.<n>I'm sure it'll continue to
drive her past<n>what we can imagine.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Her focus is what drives her ability.<n>I'm sure it'll continue to
drive her past<n>what we can imagine.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But just what is the source of all that<n>focus?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Wait! Hey, waaait!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl's Sister
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... I did it! I win!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Puff... Oooh, why didn't youwait?!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl's Sister
text_block_list.text: Cause it's a race, silly!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Waaagh! Waaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What's this? You're training outside<n>too?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sis...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
So the reporters have been hounding<n>you. It's no surprise
with you on the<n>brink of becoming a Triple Crown<n>
champion.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And... do you think you can win the<n>Kikuka Sho?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Beats me—haven't given it any<n>thought.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't mean to say it's meaningless<n>or anything, but... the
Triple Crown's<n>not my goal.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
My focus is on my own path, and on<n>that path, the third
crown is just a<n>stepping stone.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: A perfectly fitting answer for you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You've always been called a heap of<n>talent, and now
you're living up to it.<n>I'm incredibly proud of my little sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Even so, I haven't beaten you yet.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't give a damn about talent or<n>being amazing. Those
are just words.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
All I crave is to finish ahead of you<n>when we race in the
Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm honored to be the target of your<n>ambitions, but I'm
afraid I can't grant<n>your wish so easily.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I understand that much after trying to<n>catch up to you all this
time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I should get back to training. Later,<n>Sis.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Take care of yourself.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
My word, it's difficult having a sister<n>overflowing with
talent. Continuing to<n>stay in front of you is a Herculean<n>
task.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But I also have my pride as your Big<n>Sis. I can't lose to you,
Triple Crown<n>champion or not.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: GOOO! HAYAHIDEEE!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide glides to the front<n>with ease on the final
turn! The<n>favorite, Biwa Hayahide, is in the<n>lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Her pace isn't letting up even in the<n>stretch! The rest of the
pack is<n>speeding up, but Hayahide's lead is<n>only growing!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Absolutely amazing! Biwa Hayahide<n>claims victory in the
Takarazuka<n>Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Just like her sister, Narita Brian, shewins it with a landslide five-lengthlead! And in record time!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Wowie! Hayahide's incredible!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaagh! Congrats, Hayahideee!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: She really is your sister.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: She really is your sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: That goes without saying.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though they're taking different paths<n>through the Twinkle
Series, both<n>sisters are making big waves.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If they were to race against each<n>other, there's no telling
who'd come<n>out on top.
